summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5756 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 7, Kaufman's Addition to Green Lake Circle, being the alley between North 76th Street and North 77th Street, from Fremont Avenue to Linden Avenue; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75904, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
